duties_responsibilities.duty: Participates in preconstruction planning regarding the project schedule and budget.
Lead and manage the on-site subcontractors.
Coordinate and oversee all on-site work.
Examine the drawings, specifications, and addenda for design deficiencies, and possible code violations.
Ensure the project deadlines are met.
Assists Project Manager in communicating with subcontractors and employees.
Submit reports (progress, QA / QC inspection, Safety Audit) to the management team.

education_certification.credential: Associates Degree in Construction Management, Engineering, Business, or a related field preferred, or a combination of education and experience.
